# Go语言101

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/go-yuyan-101
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/go-yuyan-101
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install go-yuyan-101
go-yuyan-101 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g go-yuyan-yilingyi
go-yuyan-yilingyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
